# firecci

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of firecci is to collect source code used for validation of the FireCCI 
product. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of firecci from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r  init, eval = FALSE}
require(remotes)
remotes::install_.packages_github("lbusett/firecci")
```
